snippet: A driver killed a good Samaritan, then led the police on a 300-mile chase before he ran out of gas and was shot to death, the authorities said today.   Officers pulled up near the fugitive on a freeway exit in this Los Angeles suburb and shot him ...
lead_paragraph: A driver killed a good Samaritan, then led the police on a 300-mile chase before he ran out of gas and was shot to death, the authorities said today. Officers pulled up near the fugitive on a freeway exit in this Los Angeles suburb and shot him as he moved a sawed-off shotgun toward them, said Lyle Whitten, a California Highway Patrol officer.

headline.main: Fugitive Slain After Long Chase in California
